info.title: Todoist
info.description: Todoist is an online task management app and todo list. With Todoist, users can organize, schedule, maintain and prioritize personal tasks.

get.description: List all projects in the Todoist account.

schema.description: A Todoist Projects response object

get.description: List all tasks in the Todoist account.

schema.description: A Todoist Items response object

get.description: List all tasks in a specific project.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

schema.description: A Todoist Items response object

get.description: List the labels configured in the Todoist account.

schema.description: A Todoist Labels response object

get.description: Triggers a new flow when a task is completed.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

schema.description: A Todoist Items response object

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, complete an item.

get.description: Trigers a new flow when a task is created.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

schema.description: A Todoist Items response object

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create an item in a specific project.

post.description: Create a new task in the specified project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: New item to be added to project.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for creating an Item

date_string.description: The task due date (e.g mm-dd-yyyy, Today @ 11am, mm/dd/yyyy).

priority.description: A number between 1 and 4 (4 for very urgent and 1 for natural).

indent.description: A number between 1 and 4, where 1 is top-level).

item_order.description: A number, where the smallest value is top-level.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task.

parameters.name: changeItem
parameters.description: The updated fields of the task.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for updating an item

priority.description: A number between 1 and 4, 4 for very urgent and 1 for natural.

indent.description: A number between 1 and 4, where 1 is top-level).

item_order.description: A number, where the smallest value is top-level.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for creating a Project

color.description: A number between 0 and 11, or 0 and 21 for premium users.

indent.description: A number between 1 and 4, where 1 is top-level).

item_order.description: A number, where the smallest value is top-level.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for updating a Project

color.description: A number between 0 and 11, or 0 and 21 for premium users.

indent.description: A number between 1 and 4, where 1 is top-level).

item_order.description: A number, where the smallest value is top-level.

post.description: Share an existing project to a specific user.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for sharing a Project

email.description: The email address of user the project is being shared to.

post.description: Create a new label (premium users only).

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for creating a Label

color.description: The color of the label (a number between 0 and 7, or 0 and 12 for premium users).

item_order.description: The label's order in the label list (a number, where the smallest value is top-level).

parameters.name: label_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the label.

parameters.name: changeLabel
parameters.description: Change label

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for updating a Label

color.description: The color of the label (a number between 0 and 7, or 0 and 12 for premium users).

item_order.description: The label's order in the label list (a number, where the smallest value is top-level).

post.description: Create a new task in the specified project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: New item to be added to project.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for creating an Item

priority.description: A number between 1 and 4 (4 for very urgent and 1 for natural).

parent_id.description: The id of the parent task. Set to null for root tasks

child_order.description: The order of task. Defines the position of the task among all the tasks with the same Parent Id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task.

parameters.name: changeItem
parameters.description: The updated fields of the task.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for updating an item

priority.description: A number between 1 and 4, 4 for very urgent and 1 for natural.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for creating a Project

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49.

parent_id.description: The id of the parent project. Set to null for root projects

child_order.description: The order of project. Defines the position of the project among all the projects with the same Parent Id

is_favorite.description: Whether the project is favorite (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for updating a Project

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49.

is_favorite.description: Whether the project is favorite (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

email.description: The user email with whom to share the project.

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49.

item_order.description: Label’s order in the label list (a number, where the smallest value should place the label at the top).

get.description: List all projects in the Todoist account.
List all tasks in the Todoist account.
List all tasks in a specific project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

get.description: List the labels configured in the Todoist account.

post.description: Create a new task in the specified project.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: New item to be added to project.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for creating an Item

project_id.description: Task project id. If not set, task is put to user’s Inbox.

priority.description: A number between 1 and 4 (4 for very urgent and 1 for natural).

parent_id.description: The id of the parent task. Set to null for root tasks

order.description: The order of task. Defines the position of the task among all the tasks with the same Parent Id

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task.

parameters.name: changeItem
parameters.description: The updated fields of the task.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for updating an item

priority.description: A number between 1 and 4, 4 for very urgent and 1 for natural.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for creating a Project

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49.

parent_id.description: The id of the parent project. Set to null for root projects

favorite.description: Whether the project is favorite (a true or false value).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for updating a Project

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49.

favorite.description: Whether the project is favorite (a true or false value).

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for creating a Label

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49.

order.description: Label’s order in the label list (a number, where the smallest value should place the label at the top).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the label.

parameters.name: changeLabel
parameters.description: Change label

schema.description: A Todoist argument object for updating a Label

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49.

order.description: Label’s order in the label list.

id.description: The unique identifier of the project.

is_deleted.description: A number value (1 is true, 0 is false) indicating whether or not the project is deleted.

is_archived.description: A number value (1 is true, 0 is false) indicating whether or not the project is archived.

id.description: The unique identifier of the project.

order.description: The order of the project under the same parent.

sync_id.description: Identifier to find the match between different copies of shared projects.

date_lang.description: The language of the date (valid languages are: en, da, pl, zh, ko, de, pt, ja, it, fr, sv, ru, es, nl).

due_date_utc.description: The date of the task in the format Mon 07 Aug 2006 12:34:56 +0000.

indent.description: The indent of the task (a number between 1 and 4, where 1 is top-level).

priority.description: The priority of the task (a number between 1 and 4, 4 for very urgent and 1 for natural).

item_order.description: The order of the task inside a project (the smallest value would place the task at the top).

day_order.description: The order of the task inside the Today or Next 7 days view (a number, where the smallest value would place the task at the top).

collapsed.description: Whether the task’s sub-tasks are collapsed (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

assigned_by_uid.description: The id of the user who assigns the current task. For shared projects only.

responsible_uid.description: The id of user who is responsible for accomplishing the current task. For shared projects only.

checked.description: Whether the task is marked as completed (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

in_history.description: Whether the task has been marked as completed and is marked to be moved to history.

is_deleted.description: Whether the task is marked as deleted (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

is_archived.description: Whether the task is marked as archived (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

sync_id.description: A special id for shared tasks (a number or null if not set). Used internally and can be ignored.

date_added.description: The date when the task was created.

date_lang.description: The language of the date (valid languages are: en, da, pl, zh, ko, de, pt, ja, it, fr, sv, ru, es, nl).

due_date_utc.description: The date of the task in the format 2006-08-07T16:34:56Z.

parent_id.description: The id of the parent task. Set to null for root tasks

child_order.description: The order of task. Defines the position of the task among all the tasks with the same parent_id

priority.description: The priority of the task (a number between 1 and 4, 4 for very urgent and 1 for natural).

day_order.description: The order of the task inside the Today or Next 7 days view (a number, where the smallest value would place the task at the top).

collapsed.description: Whether the task’s sub-tasks are collapsed (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

assigned_by_uid.description: The id of the user who assigns the current task. For shared projects only.

responsible_uid.description: The id of user who is responsible for accomplishing the current task. For shared projects only.

checked.description: Whether the task is marked as completed (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

in_history.description: Whether the task has been marked as completed and is marked to be moved to history.

is_deleted.description: Whether the task is marked as deleted (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

sync_id.description: A special id for shared tasks (a number or null if not set). Used internally and can be ignored.

date_added.description: The date when the task was created.

section_id.description: Id of section task belongs to.

parent_id.description: The id of the parent task. Set to null for root tasks.

order.description: The order of task. Defines the position of the task among all the tasks with the same parent_id

priority.description: The priority of the task (a number between 1 and 4, 4 for very urgent and 1 for natural).

url.description: URL to access this task in Todoist web interface.

id.description: The id of the completed task entry.

task_id.description: The id of the completed task.

completed_date.description: The date when the task was completed.

note_count.description: The number of notes of the task.

color.description: The color of the label (a number between 0 and 7, or between 0 and 12 for premium users).

item_order.description: Label’s order in the label list (a number, where the smallest value is top-level).

is_deleted.description: Whether the label is marked as deleted (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49, more info - https://developer.todoist.com/sync/v8/#colors

item_order.description: Label’s order in the label list (a number, where the smallest value should place the label at the top).

is_deleted.description: Whether the label is marked as deleted (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

is_favorite.description: Whether the label is favorite (where 1 is true and 0 is false).

color.description: Color id. It’s a value between 30 and 49, more info - https://developer.todoist.com/sync/v8/#colors

order.description: Label’s order in the label list (a number, where the smallest value should place the label at the top).

favorite.description: Whether the label is favorite (a true or false value).
